Não recomendo para os cristãos e seus filhos

Esse jogo é muito violento, não deixaria meus filhos jogarem esse jogo. Pais, fiquem atentos. Esse jogo consiste em fugir do inimigo lá de baixo e os pobres sobreviventes não podem fazer nada, eles são torturados, jogados em ganchos, tem muita violência, muito sangue... Eu joguei uma partida que caiu contra uma senhora grávida e o filho dela tinha vários olhos na cabeça, isso é coisa de Deus? Alguns inimigos riem da sua cara, tipo um médico psicopata que adora torturar os sobreviventes, e também tem um palhaço gordo e drogado que fica esfaqueando e drogando os sobreviventes. Além de influenciar a violencia, também influencia o uso de drogas. Esse jogo com certeza foi criado para cultivar o mal e atrair o inimigo. claramente não tem nada de positivo que pode se tirar desse jogo. Nunca mais vou deixar os meus filhos jogarem isso também. NOTA 0 pra esse jogo violento!

I used to love this game. It scratched an itch that other games just don't. I play both killer and survivor, and have enjoyed the cosmetics for both.  I used to highly recommend this game, and really wish I still could, but I can't.  It's been shown on many Twitch, and other gaming streams how prolific the problem with hackers is.  I took a multimonth hiatus from DbD to let my rank degrade and give the developers a chance to adjust the game and maybe set myself up for some games that felt like a fair challenge.  previously hacking was mostly at higher rank. However my first two games back and there were hackers in both of them.  What's worse is that there is no way to know for sure who is actually hacking to know who to report.  I know that hacking is difficult to fix, and that banning hackers is a tedious process, but Behaviour needs to figure something out, because there's no real sport in playing DbD anymore.  People are instantly reviving from the dying state, and completing generators that they are no longer working on. As a survivor this isn't anymore enjoyable than as a killer. There's nothing like dying because the other survivors were hacking and didn't need to play cautiously or cooperate with you and get you killed.  I support them trying to re-balance the game, so it doesn't allow survivors to troll killers as hard as they can, and make them play more cautiously, but I feel like the biggest issue, and what is ruining the game is actually the amount of hacking.

He jugado suficientes horas a este juego como para decir que la experiencia de juego es terrible. Los balanceos siempre son pobres, insuficientes y nunca consiguen el objetivo que se proponen que deberia ser balancear. A rasgos generales, el juego no es disfrutable, te ofrece frustración, enfado e impotencia a cambio de nada. Otra cosa es que el juego sea puramente competitivo y no exista un modo casual y que el Matchmaking empareje a principiantes con jugadores veteranos.
No encuentro una cosa buena que decir de este juego salvo que si te hace ilusión que te maten, este es tu juego.
Terrible juego, mi mejor recomendación es que no lo compreis.

Ich habe mir Dead By Daylight ende 2016 gekauft und es machte mir auch immer Spaß, vor allem mit Freunden. Ich habe eine sehr lange zeit kein Dead by Daylight gespielt, bis ich Ende 2021 wieder einen Pc hatte, der Gut genug ist um Dead by Daylight Flüssig zu zocken. Aber seit dem neuen update macht es meiner Meinung nach nicht mehr so viel Spaß. Die Devs wollen das Spiel Killer gercht machen, wobei das spiel schon Killer gerecht genug ist. Jeder haken ist gefühlt 1 mm voneinander entfernt. Ich denke es gibt Leute, die auch meiner Meinung sind.

TL;DR

I’m gonna start by saying this, If you are a solo survivor or if you are a newer killer in this game, you will most likely not have much fun. This game as of now is catered towards players who are very experienced and not towards casual and new players. Also good ol functioning MMR working as intended!


Full review so far (FROM THE UPDATE)  (6.1.1) 

This update has made playing survivor FROM MY PERSPECTIVE feel like it’s a full time job. It makes you feel so drained for practically no reward in return. (Not to mention the large amounts of tunneling and gen regression perks that killers use now more than ever makes this game so draining). Also not to mention MMR right now, some killers will slug for the 4k at 3 gens left and on the other hand are brand new killers who literally just picked up the game and get gen rushed. 

I do agree that even before this update, killers did need a buff. However, I think they did a bit too much for killers and didn't change/buff enough meh survivor perks. I get that the WHOLE POINT of this update was so survivors didn’t have to feel like they needed to use perks like BT, Dead Hard, Unbreakable, and DS to simply avoid getting tunneled and camped. On the contrary for killers, to not feel like they have to use perks like Corrupt, Ruin/Pop, and Scourge hooks to simply slow down the gens to get some sort of pressure and stop getting gen rushed. But from what I’ve played thus far in the update, all I feel like is that survivors have to use these perks more than ever. The base kit BT is not long enough to do anything and they did nothing for camping. Of anything this has gotten worse. As for killers around the 20 matches that I’ve played so far, nearly every killer had roughly the same builds, which was gen regression perks. Idk this game as of now just feels awful to play.

I've also watched a lot of DBD steamers/content creators over my time with this game and from what I got, most of them say that this update is more or less "fair" and even ones who are killer mains that played survivor say it's fine and that people are just over exaggerating. From watching them play, it seems that way. However they also have to take into consideration that most people who play this are playing for fun on their own time.....not for a job. I get that SWF are annoying for killers. But really what this update did was hurt solo survivors even more than ever.

Well, I feel like I rambled on long enough, but this is how this game has been for me for this update, people may have different experiences so far, but for me it’s just been rough.

I want this game to be fun for anyone who plays, so I hope that in the future, some changes can make this happen!

本来挺好一游戏，一直削人是什么意思？削人还加强屠夫？你咋不直接把人类跑步取消改成屠夫全图飞？设计师不玩游戏？回坑老玩家直接不会玩了，人根本没体验。咬根直接75%声音，DH直接变成扛一刀，别的一些机制和延迟刀就更不用说了。先不说新玩家体验如何，随便一个屠夫直追都能砍出屎，更别说怨灵之类的或非走地屠夫了。本来和朋友娱乐随便玩玩，现在变成坐牢。想解决车队或者速修有很多办法，策划和设计师选了最恶心玩家的。只能说是失望透顶，不会再打开了，也建议大家早点洗洗睡了，何必找虐?

Very toxic community and constant reworks that are never enough to satisfy anyone. It is a good kick if you have friends willing to buy it and the devs are regularly "patching" things so I guess they are attempting. But why do I have to pay my real money for these (not including licensed products of course) outfits or killers? Why is progression just a very slow and not really rewarding experience (unless you grind it). It is an interesting game but don't waste the time trying to get good at it. Save yourself the trouble and play something else.
